item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, August 28, 2024 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The journey of an internet packet: Exploring networks with traceroute (205 points | 72 comments)
2. Diffusion models are real-time game engines (886 points | 318 comments)
3. In Pre-WWII Berlin, the Shape of Your Roof Was a Highly Political Decision (22 points | 4 comments)
4. Formal CHERI: design-time proof of full-scale architecture security properties (70 points | 8 comments)
5. High-Temperature Gibbs States Are Unentangled and Efficiently Preparable (12 points | 2 comments)
6. Reflex (YC W23) Is Hiring Python Software Engineers ( | hide)
7. Show HN: IPA, a GUI for exploring inner details of PDFs (133 points | 19 comments)
8. Typing lists and tuples in Elixir (108 points | 18 comments)
9. A dishwasher can make or break a restaurant (2017) (116 points | 240 comments)
10. Show HN: Every open source tool from the "What's HN working on" thread (55 points | 9 comments)
11. COSMIC Alpha Released (209 points | 113 comments)
12. The slow evaporation of the free/open source surplus (73 points | 46 comments)
13. Interview with Signal President Meredith Whittaker (64 points | 37 comments)
14. PC Floppy Copy Protection: Formaster Copy-Lock (29 points | 8 comments)
15. French prosecutors say Telegram CEO freed from custody, will appear in court (83 points | 57 comments)
16. Microsoft donates the Mono Project to the Wine team (1263 points | 413 comments)
17. Amazon Still Has a Counterfeit Problem (33 points | 16 comments)
18. Judge dismisses majority of GitHub Copilot copyright claims (111 points | 61 comments)
19. A Collection of Free Public APIs That Is Tested Daily (518 points | 100 comments)
20. Wp2hugo: Best WordPress to Hugo migrator (written in Go) (82 points | 28 comments)
21. What is the longest known sequence that repeats in Pi? (homelab) (10 points | 2 comments)
22. Box64 and RISC-V in 2024 (11 points | 1 comment)
23. State and time are the same thing (14 points | 10 comments)
24. Tesla drivers say new FSD update is repeatedly running red lights (18 points | discuss)
25. The Monospace Web (541 points | 134 comments)
26. Show HN: Relari – Auto Prompt Optimizer as Lightweight Alternative to Finetuning (16 points | 1 comment)
27. Faster CRDTs (2021) (308 points | 102 comments)
28. Tesla’s TTPoE at Hot Chips 2024: Replacing TCP for Low Latency Applications (147 points | 83 comments)
29. Sapiens: Foundation for Human Vision Models (43 points | 1 comment)
30. Immovable Ladder (18 points | 6 comments)
